state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, go to the south. Following that, move south. If you can succeed at that, make an attempt to move east. And then, attempt to travel north. With that done, travel east. Following that, make an effort to go to the east. And then, move north. That done, go north. And then, head north. Then, head west. With that done, ensure that the gateway is open. Once you have pulled open the gateway, try to go west. Then, make an effort to go west. With that done, pick up the licorice strip from the floor of the studio. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Workshop =- You've entered a workshop. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Workshop =-0/1
next_state: -= Washroom =- You find yourself in a washroom. A standard kind of place. Let's see what's in here. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a trunk. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Washroom =-0/2

next_state: -= Bedchamber =- You are in a bedchamber. An usual kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a suitcase. Wow, check out the price tag that's still affixed to the suitcase! Sixty dollars! You can make out a bed. The bed is normal. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. This always happens, here in TextWorld! There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Bedchamber =-0/16
